summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3751 , for the improvement of Wilcott Avenue, from Seward Park Avenue to 54th Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues by constructing watermains, under Ordinance No. 46102 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
